comment.author: 27604515@N04
comment._content: Sorry, but there are no Japanese aircraft in this picture. The flying boats are Dornier Do 24 (identified by Eugen Pinak on the j-aircraft.org message board). Additionally we see Fokker C.XI (second group from the left side) and T.IV (the big floatplanes).

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
